post.body: sounds like a blast...I am a huge NASCAR fan...80 degrees sounds awesome right now ha ha
I lked the same classes you liked :)
what did I learn in Psych class?...deep breathing helps relieve stress...we will see about that ha ha
okay I feel better...well kinda...it is going to be a nutso day based on the emails I have recieved so far...
...who is mad cuz your truck is better then his lame S40...dude you are driving a girls car...accept that you are a sad little man
I love how you can tell your day is going to be awesome when you get behind some loser doing 10 miles under the speed limit...
back to the old one for now
oopps...I never fixed my pic last night...darn
good morning
wow...what a crazy morning...time to grab some lunch!
damn my picture when down again...why does this always happen when I am at work and can't fix it! ug Twitter
not looking forward to the class I am taking this session...spreadsheets lab...how boring!
good morning all!
I forgot how great the lion the witch and the wardrobe is...I love watching awesome movies
saw Aladdin advertisement in the opening credits for Narnia...wow feeling old...remember when that movie first came out
wow contemplating drinking some wine at 9:06 AM....hey why not
looking forward to going to the exhibit in late January...I am such a "big" kid :)
about to watch first 2 Narnia movies...can not wait for the 3rd installment
good morning
time to watch some hockey...
